it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.icmp4

Class IcmpMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.icmp4.IcmpMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Packet, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IcmpDestinationUnreachableMessage, IcmpEchoReplyMessage, IcmpEchoRequestMessage, IcmpParameterProblemMessage, IcmpRedirectMessage, IcmpSourceQuenchMessage, IcmpTimeExceededMessage

    public class IcmpMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Packet
    ICMP (Internet Control Message Protocol) packet.

      • IcmpMessage

        public IcmpMessage(Address src_addr,
                   Address dst_addr,
                   int type,
                   int code,
                   byte[] buf,
                   int off,
                   int len)
        Creates a new ICMP packet.
        Parameters:
        src_addr - IP source address
        dst_addr - IP destination address
        type - ICMP message type
        code - ICMP subtype code
        buf - buffer containing the ICMP packet excluding the first 4 bytes
        off - the offset within the buffer
        len - the length of the ICMP packet minus 4

      • IcmpMessage

        len - the length of the ICMP packet
